body.p: <radialGradient id="tokenGlow" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
<rect x="25" y="50" width="1350" height="700" rx="30" fill="#1a1a2e" stroke="#4a4a5a" stroke-width="5"/>
<rect x="50" y="75" width="1050" height="550" rx="20" fill="#0f0f1e"/>
<rect x="75" y="90" width="600" height="40" rx="20" fill="#2c3e50"/>
<rect x="205" y="95" width="60" height="30" rx="15" fill="#3498db"/>
<text x="235" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">1H</text>
<text x="305" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">24H</text>
<text x="375" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">7D</text>
<text x="445" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">30D</text>
<text x="515" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">1Y</text>
<text x="1025" y="110" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">WALLET</text>
<circle cx="575" cy="300" r="80" fill="#16213e" stroke="#00ff00" stroke-width="3">
<text x="575" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">DOGE
<text x="575" y="310" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#00ff00" text-anchor="middle">+12.5%
<text x="575" y="330" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#aaaaaa" text-anchor="middle">$10.2B | 9Y
<circle cx="375" cy="200" r="70" fill="#16213e" stroke="#ff4136" stroke-width="3">
<text x="375" y="190" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">SHIB
<text x="375" y="210" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ff4136" text-anchor="middle">-5.2%
<text x="375" y="230" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#aaaaaa" text-anchor="middle">$6.8B | 3Y
<circle cx="775" cy="350" r="60" fill="#16213e" stroke="#00ff00" stroke-width="3">
<text x="775" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">PEPE
<text x="775" y="360" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#00ff00" text-anchor="middle">+45.2%
<text x="775" y="380" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#aaaaaa" text-anchor="middle">$1.5B | 6M
<circle cx="225" cy="400" r="50" fill="#16213e" stroke="#00ff00" stroke-width="2">
<text x="225" y="395" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">FLOKI
<text x="225" y="410" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#00ff00" text-anchor="middle">+18.7%
<text x="225" y="425" font-family="Arial" font-size="8" fill="#aaaaaa" text-anchor="middle">$250M | 2Y
<circle cx="175" cy="700" r="40" fill="#34495e" stroke="#95a5a6" stroke-width="3"/>
<circle cx="975" cy="700" r="40" fill="#34495e" stroke="#95a5a6" stroke-width="3"/>
<rect x="310" y="675" width="30" height="50" fill="#95a5a6" rx="2"/>
<rect x="300" y="685" width="50" height="30" fill="#95a5a6" rx="2"/>
<text x="475" y="675" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">BUY</text>
<text x="675" y="675" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">SELL</text>
<rect x="1125" y="75" width="225" height="550" rx="20" fill="#1a1a2e"/>
<text x="1237" y="162" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">Streamer's Video</text>
<text x="1145" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">User1: Great stream! 🚀</text>
<text x="1145" y="315" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">User2: DOGE to the moon!</text>
<text x="1145" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">User3: What's your take on PEPE?</text>
<text x="1145" y="620" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#95a5a6">Type your message...</text>
<text x="1305" cy="105" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">LIVE</text>
<!-- Reflections and highlights for a more realistic look -->
<rect x="30" y="55" width="1340" height="10" fill="white" opacity="0.1" rx="5"/>
<rect x="30" y="55" width="10" height="690" fill="white" opacity="0.1" rx="5"/>
